# SCnorm: robust normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data

This is the development branch of SCnorm currently v0.99.5.
This version does not require R version >= 3.4 and uses parallel instead of BiocParallel.

Details of SCnorm may be found in the vignette located here: [SCnorm Vignette](https://www.biostat.wisc.edu/~kendzior/SCNORM/SCnorm.pdf)

## Installation

This version of SCnorm can be installed by:

```R
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("rhondabacher/SCnorm", ref="devel")
```
